metadata.title: CVE-2019-9799 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Insufficient bounds checking of data during inter-process communicationmight allow a compromised content process to be able to read memory fromthe parent process under certain conditions. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 66.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 66.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '66.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
